summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the integration of LoRA adapters with SDXL diffusion models, covering scenarios such as controlnet, canny preprocessing, multi‑adapter configurations, blockwise application, fusion/unfusion mechanisms, efficiency measurements, and sequential CPU offloading.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, performance, and scalability of LoRA‑enhanced SDXL pipelines for image generation services, enabling confident deployment and optimization of adaptive model components.
